message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $140. I believe it would be a valuable addition for you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within a $100 limit. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $100?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints. How about we meet in the middle at $130? This offer reflects the true value of the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I think $120 would be a fair price for both of us considering my budget. I hope you can meet me halfway.
